prA prA

VRiddhi or lengthened form of 1. pra in comp. (cf. Pāṇ. vi , 3 , 122) . Observe in the following derivatives , only the second member of the simple compound from which they come is given in the parentheses , leaving the preposition pra (lengthened to prA in the derivatives) to be supplied. (prob. = bhsu fr. bhAsu , √ bhAs) , aspect , appearance , form , shape (only ifc. ; cf. aruNa'- , Rta-psu , &c.) _ MW090006 715,3 L=141595
